Review: This shop provides a good quality stationary such as kinds of writing books, notes books, drawing books, book covers, bags, kinds of papers, pencils, pens, markers, art paints, kinds of rulers, digital calculators, self adhesive tapes. The space is so narrow.
Very good place, always my choice for stationary items - all what you need in one place.
Veryyyyy bad as it was crowded and no rules and Veryyyyy long queue

Unorganized small space, too many people.
Otherwise, brilliant

if u need any art 🎨 supplies, notebooks for school or any office supplies u came to the right place. this multifloors mall have all u need in terms of stationary and they are not very expensive, also whats really cool is the fact that their staff doesn't like to bother u while browsing for stuff to buy.
friendly helpfull staff, all stationary I need under one roof

Good place, helpful staff 
Has several good items but some things are overpriced
Great place to shop for stationery.
Best store for all school supply needs.
